column2: Fighting style (e.g., a tanky fighter locking down a crowded choke point)
Weapon type (e.g., an evocation mage demolishing twig blights with the Fireball spell)
Language spoken (e.g., a bard negotiating in Undercommon with a Drow enemy)
Skills used (e.g., a Barbarian using their Athletics to push a boulder onto a dragon)
Backstory (e.g., a mysterious enemy being revealed as a character from a PC’s past)
Equipment owned (e.g., a rogue using their climbing kit to sneak over the estate’s wall)
